title: Add the ability to rename torrents and files
body:
Hi all

It could ne nice to have the ability to change torrent name and files names when adding it via vuze remonte.

title: Sort by ratio doesn't work properly
body:
Hello,
First of all, thank you for this great app !
I have noticed that sorting torrents by ratio doesn't take into account the digits after the comma. Is it normal or an issue ?
Thank you
